column3: Traffic;Preah Sihanouk:------ A collision between 3 vehicles has reportedly killed at least one. The crash occurred  at 9:30 pm on September 5
column4: 2019 on National Road 4 in Bek Kiri Village
column6: Prey Nop District (*an notorious accident black spot).------According to preliminary reports
column7: a car hit the rear of a container truck and was the hit by another truck from behind
column8: completely crushing the car.------Police were working overnight to remove the dead and clear the wreckage from the road. (Huy Bunleng)
